Description:
Position Title:             Project ManagerEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                        up to 20K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:            Dubai, UAE About the Client:A well-established group of companies with expertise in diversified business units such as technology, healthcare, real estate, tourism, food & beverage and hospitality Job Description:Ensure the quality of store construction projects including controlling timing commitments, cost and quality of new store construction and new store renovation
Plan and coordinate all aspects of the store construction process, including hiring contractors and working with engineers, architects and various other vendors related to constructing or renovating stores
Oversee all onsite and offsite constructions to monitor compliance with building and safety regulations
Review and approve proposed project timeline for construction for winning contractor
Monitors performance of all projects for timely completion of construction Skills
Skills:
40 years old and below
Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering
At least 5 years’ experience in leading large scale, commercial architectural design and construction projects
Should have QSR experience
